name: Ariana Grande x Swarovski stud earrings
specs: Mixed cuts, Heart, White, Rhodium plated
description: Two hearts become one in this joyful pair of Swarovski pierced studs. Each rhodium plated piece features a heart-shaped crystal, which is surrounded by a glittering halo of clear pavé. Pair them with the matching pendant for a radiant gift of love.
careInstructions: Store in original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water, lotions, perfumes or cleaning products.
Remove before washing hands, swimming, or applying cosmetics.
Avoid hard knocks that could chip crystals.

name: Ariana Grande x Swarovski bangle
specs: Crystal pearl, Baguette cut, White, Rhodium plated
description: This music-inspired bangle combines elegance with creativity. Taking the abstract form of a treble clef, the rhodium plated design is beautifully spiraled and set with baguette-cut Swarovski Zirconia. For an extra touch of luxury, a single Swarovski Crystal Pearl is then placed at the center. The perfect way to give your style an upbeat and rhythmic infusion.
careInstructions: Store in original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water, lotions, perfumes or cleaning products.
Remove before washing hands, swimming, or applying cosmetics.
Avoid hard knocks that could chip crystals.

name: Ariana Grande x Swarovski bracelet
specs: Crystal pearl, Round cut, White, Rhodium plated
description: Discover a pure expression of elegance in this refined bracelet. Easily adjustable with a sliding ball closure, the rhodium plated design features two rows of cupchain, set with clear Swarovski Zirconia in round cuts. An adornment of Swarovski Crystal Pearls is then added below for a sensational look of luxury. Pair this bracelet with the matching choker to create your own expressive combination.
careInstructions: Store in original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water, lotions, perfumes or cleaning products.
Remove before washing hands, swimming, or applying cosmetics.
Avoid hard knocks that could chip crystals.

name: Ariana Grande x Swarovski choker
specs: Mixed cuts, Crystal pearl, Heart, White, Rhodium plated
description: This radiant choker was made for an intense expression of love. The rhodium plated design is partly decorated with luxurious Swarovski Crystal Pearls, while at the front, there is a row of heart-shaped crystals, each surrounded by a glittering halo of clear pavé. A sliding closure at the back means you can adjust the jewelry to your perfect fit. Pair this bold necklace with other matching jewelry to create your own romantic combinations.
careInstructions: Store in original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water, lotions, perfumes or cleaning products.
Remove before washing hands, swimming, or applying cosmetics.
Avoid hard knocks that could chip crystals.

name: Ariana Grande x Swarovski choker
specs: Crystal pearl, Round cut, White, Rhodium plated
description: Make a lasting impression with this bright and extravagant choker. Easily adjustable with a sliding ball closure, the rhodium plated design features two rows of cupchain, set with clear Swarovski Zirconia in round cuts. An adornment of Swarovski Crystal Pearls is then added below for a sensational look of pure star power. Pair this choker with the matching bracelet to create your own expressive combination.
careInstructions: Store in original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water, lotions, perfumes or cleaning products.
Remove before washing hands, swimming, or applying cosmetics.

name: Ariana Grande x Swarovski necklace
specs: Mixed cuts, Heart, White, Rhodium plated
description: Shining a light on love, this Swarovski necklace is romantic as well as radiant. The rhodium plated design features a full circle of heart-shaped crystals, each surrounded by a glittering halo of clear pavé. Pair this necklace with other matching jewelry to create your own expressive combinations.
careInstructions: Store in original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water, lotions, perfumes or cleaning products.
Remove before washing hands, swimming, or exercising.
Polish gently with a soft, lint-free cloth.

name: Ariana Grande x Swarovski necklace
specs: Crystal pearl, Heart cut, Heart, White, Rhodium plated
description: Infused with Swarovski’s finest savoir-faire, this ultra glamorous necklace celebrates luxury as well as light. The rhodium plated design uses Swarovski Crystal Pearls to maximum effect, placing them around the necklace itself, and also in different sizes around the central heart-shaped crystal. A beautifully crafted piece of jewelry for yourself, or a joyful gift of love for someone you adore.
careInstructions: Store in original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water, lotions, perfumes or cleaning products.
Remove before washing hands, swimming, or applying cosmetics.
Avoid hard knocks that could chip crystals.

name: Ariana Grande x Swarovski Y necklace
specs: Mixed cuts, Crystal pearl, Heart, White, Rhodium plated
description: Crafted with finesse and timeless beauty, this T-shaped necklace is emblematic of Swarovski’s joyful extravagance. The rhodium plated design features a delicate chain accented with Swarovski Crystal Pearls. A heart-shaped motif is placed at the center and is surrounded by glittering pavé, while the hanging strand provides a final flourish of sophistication. Pair this necklace with other matching jewelry to create your own radiant combinations.
careInstructions: Store in original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water, lotions, perfumes or cleaning products.
Remove before washing hands, swimming, or applying cosmetics.
Avoid hard knocks that could chip crystals.

name: Ariana Grande x Swarovski pendant
specs: Mixed cuts, Heart, White, Rhodium plated
description: Follow your heart and let romance shine with this radiant Swarovski pendant. Suspended from a delicate chain, the rhodium plated design features a heart-shaped crystal, which is surrounded by a glittering halo of clear pavé. Pair it with the matching studs for a radiant gift of love.
careInstructions: Store in original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water, lotions, perfumes or cleaning products.
Remove before washing hands, swimming, or applying cosmetics.
Polish gently with a soft, lint-free cloth.

name: Idyllia necklace
specs: Mixed cuts, Flower, Multicolored, Gold-tone plated
description: This all-around necklace expresses the joy of nature through a mix of warm colors and floral motifs. The gold-tone plated design features a row of bezel-set oval crystals, beautifully interspersed with flowers, and is finished with a decorated elongation for an adjustable fit. Expressing Swarovski savoir-faire at its finest, this delicate creation matches perfectly with other jewelry pieces from the same family.
careInstructions: Store your jewelry in the original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water.
Remove jewelry before washing hands, swimming, and/or applying products (e.g. perfume, hairspray, soap, or lotion).
Avoid hard contact (i.e. knocking against objects) that can scratch or chip the crystal.

name: Una Angelic necklace
specs: Round cut, White, Gold-tone plated
description: Capturing a look of timeless sophistication, this radiant Una necklace is one of Swarovski’s most cherished silhouettes. The gold-tone plated design features a full surround of large round-cut crystals, each framed by a halo of clear pavé. The foldover clasp delivers a seamless closure, while the additional extender means you can adjust the jewelry for both comfort and size. A perfect way to accentuate the glamour in your day-to-night styling.
careInstructions: Store your jewelry in the original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water.

Remove jewelry before washing hands, swimming, and/or applying products (e.g. perfume, hairspray, soap, or lotion), as this could harm the metal and reduce the life of the plating, as well as cause discoloration and loss of crystal brilliance.
Avoid hard contact (i.e. knocking against objects) that can scratch or chip the crystal.

name: Una Angelic necklace
specs: Round cut, Double-sided motifs, White, Rhodium plated
description: This innovative jewelry can be worn as a necklace or a choker, giving you a versatile choice for everyday wear. The rhodium plated chain features a sliding mechanism for an easily adjustable fit and is adorned in glittering double-sided motifs. Simply reverse the necklace to showcase a different display of round-cut crystals. Mix and match with other Una Angelic pieces for a look of ultimate radiance.
careInstructions: Store your jewelry in the original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water.
Remove jewelry before washing hands, swimming, and/or applying products (e.g. perfume, hairspray, soap, or lotion).
Avoid hard contact (i.e. knocking against objects) that can scratch or chip the crystal.

name: Constella necklace
specs: Crystal pearl, Round cuts, White, Rhodium plated
description: Launch your style into the stars with this versatile Constella creation. The rhodium plated design features a special pulling mechanism, allowing you to wear the jewelry as a necklace or a choker. At the front, the different-sized Swarovski Zirconia and Swarovski Crystal Pearls almost seem to float among the discrete articulations, producing a look of cosmic wonder. Play with the different styling possibilities and wear it alongside a matching ring for endless reflections of light.
careInstructions: Store your jewelry in the original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.
Avoid contact with water.

Remove jewelry before washing hands, swimming, and/or applying products (e.g. perfume, hairspray, soap, or lotion), as this could harm the metal and reduce the life of the plating, as well as cause discoloration and loss of crystal brilliance.
Avoid hard contact (i.e. knocking against objects) that can scratch or chip the crystal.

name: Swarovski Remix Collection strand
specs: Round cut, White, Gold-tone plated
description: Enjoy the effortless simplicity of this shining Swarovski bracelet. The gold-tone plated silhouette features large links and shimmering crystals at regular intervals in between. A timeless accessory for yourself or an elegant gift for someone special.
careInstructions: Store your jewelry in the original packaging or a soft pouch to avoid scratches.

name: Imber Tennis bracelet
specs: Mixed round cuts, White, Gold-tone plated
description: Made for everyday elegance, this gold-tone plated bracelet exudes the simplicity of the Imber family. The design features a gradient of clear round-cut crystals, each placed in a modern bezel setting on a soft chain, with a sliding closure for easy wearability. Each delicate drop provides glowing sophistication for your wrist, giving you a go-to piece of jewelry that can be playfully stacked with other styles.

name: Imber bracelet
specs: Round cut, Scattered design, White, Gold-tone plated
description: With its dynamic mix of shapes, this Imber bracelet will give your wrist a distinctive glow. The gold-tone plated design features a lobster closure and a strand of metal droplets, accented with dazzling round-cut crystals in a puffy bezel setting. The piece can also be combined with an attachable Imber extender to wear as an anklet. A perfect choice to wear alone or matched with radiant earrings from the same family.

name: Constella bracelet
specs: Crystal pearl, Round cut, White, Rose gold-tone plated
description: Created for sheer elegance, this Constella bracelet is rose gold-tone plated and features two interconnecting links, with one adorned in clear pavé. A single Swarovski Crystal Pearl delicately hangs beneath, while the sliding closure allows for an adjustable fit. For a harmonized look, pair this bracelet with matching earrings or a pendant from the same family.

name: Idyllia bracelet
specs: Mixed cuts, Flower, Multicolored, Gold-tone plated
description: Signify your connection to nature with this bright and delicate Idyllia bracelet. On a gold-tone plated chain, the central motif reveals a beautiful flower made from crystals in various cuts and soft shades, including the single leaf on the spiraling stem. A lobster closure and elongation allow you to adjust this bracelet to your size. Wear it with other wondrous pieces from the Idyllia garden to coordinate your look.

name: Mesmera bangle
specs: Mixed cuts, White, Rose gold-tone plated
description: Surround your wrist in the elegant and dazzling style of Mesmera. This rose gold-tone plated bangle features a pavé of crystals on each side, combined with two Swarovski Zirconia at the center in pear and octagon-step cuts. A radiant duo that catches the light from every angle. The bracelet features a hanging elongation and is a refined piece for celebratory occasions.
